column2: "Na aber no ara mu binom wɔ hɔ a wɔkaa Galiliifo a Pilate dze hɔn bɔgyaa foraa hɔn afɔrbɔdze mu no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ no."

column3: Ana hom susu dɛ Galiliifo yi osiandɛ wohun dɛm amandze ntsi
column4: wɔyɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo kyɛn Galiliifo nyina?"

column3: Dabida: na mbom gyedɛ hom nu homho
column4: ɔno hom nyina bɛhyew dɛmara."

column2: "Anaaso hom susu dɛ nyimpa duawɔtwe a Siloam abantsentsen hwee hɔn do kum hɔn no
column3: wɔyɛ ndzebɔnyɛfo kyɛn hɔn a wɔtse Jerusalɛm nyina?"
Dabida: na mbom gyedɛ hom nu homho
column4: ɔno hom nyina bɔkɔ ɔsɛɛ mu dɛmara."

column5: na mennya bi: twa no kyen; ɔyɛ dɛn na ɔkantan asaase no do so?"

column2: "Nna ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ wɔ nhyiamudan bi mu ahomgyeda."

column3: ɔfrɛɛ no see no dɛ
column4: Ɔbaa

column2: "Na ɔdze ne nsa too no do
column3: na ntsɛmara ɔtsenee
column4: na ɔhyɛɛ Nyankopɔn enyimnyam."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ nhyiamudan mu panyin no ebufuw dɛ Jesus asa yarba wɔ ahomgyeda mu no
column3: ɔsee nyimpadodow no dɛ
column4: Nda esia wɔ hɔ a ɔsɛ dɛ wɔdze yɛ edwuma: no mu na hom mbra ma wɔnsa hom yarba
column5: na nnyɛ ahomgyeda no mu a."

column3: Ndabrabafo
column4: ana hom mu biara nnsan ne nantwi

column2: "Na ɔnnsɛ dɛ ɔbaa yi a ɔyɛ Abraham babaa a Satan akyekyer no
column3: mfe araa duawɔtwe yi
column4: wɔsan no fi nkyekyeree yi mu ahomgyeda anaa?"

column3: hɔn a wɔkasaa tsiaa no no nyina enyi toe
column4: na nyimpadodow no nyina dzii dɛw wɔ enyimnyam ndzɛmba a ɔyɛe no nyina ho."

column3: Nyankopɔn ahenman no tse dɛ ebɛnadze
column4: na ebɛnadze koraa na medze mobɔto ho?"

column2: "Ɔtse dɛ sinape abafua a nyimpa fae kɔtoo no ture mu; na onyinii yɛɛ dua kɛse
column3: na wimu nnoma bɛgyegyee n’abaw do."
Ebɛnadze na medze Nyankopɔn ahenman no mobɔto ho?"

column2: "Ɔtse dɛ mbɔrkaw a ɔbaa fae sumaa mbɔr korbaa ebiasa mu dze kesii dɛ ne nyina kawee."
"Na okoduaduaa nkurow nye nkuroba mu kyerɛkyerɛe
column3: a ɔnam do rokɔ Jerusalɛm."
